QuestData.Title: Release the Valves
QuestData.Description: We have to stop Trade Prince Gallywix's oil supply and bring his machines to a grinding halt.$B$BWe're going to need you to go out to the KTC Oil Platform and release the valves to overload the coolant system. After you do that, head to the platform control panel on the platform and set it to blow.
QuestData.RewardText: All of the lights and indicators on the control panel are going crazy!
